basics.label: Sexual Assault Crisis Counselor / Victim Advocate
basics.summary: Skilled in active listening, curriculum development, group facilitation, crisis counseling.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Sexual Assault Crisis Counselor / Victim Advocate
work.summary: One on one trauma-informed crisis counseling to clients with an emphasis on empowerment. Provided advocacy and accompaniment for clients at the hospital, police, and court level. Facilitated support groups to men and women at various community agencies. Legislative Advocacy Committee Liaison.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Visit clients in their homes, nursing facilities, and hospital setting. Maintained a caseload of 20 - 30 clients. Provided Psych-Social initials and updated assessments. Coordinated community services for clients and their families.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Facilitated educational training in the community on domestic violence and sexual assault.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Train and Supervise 153 employees and new supervisors.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Developed and implemented curriculum on issues of domestic violence, sexual assault, and self-esteem for male and female support groups.
